author: Jean-Pierre
content: I wonder if we will ever get to hear the result.

author: Rick Spilman
content: No doubt the underwriters will be taking a very close look at the circumstances of the sinking.

author: Jean-Pierre
content: The price of scrap is quite strong at the moment but perhaps the insured value was even stronger.

author: Peter Wright
content:
A floating restaurant that has not made a profit since 2013 sinks in 1000 metres of water under tow in heavy weather easily predicted in this modern day of weather apps?

It’s enough to make you cynical.

author: Mark R. Harris
content: I can’t be the only one who suspects that it was sunk on purpose for the insurance. Encountering “adverse conditions” near the scantly inhabited Paracel Islands, that’s as suspicious-sounding as it gets.
